name: FAudioInputDeviceProperty
doc:
Encapsulates the array of audio input devices which is populated by UTakeRecorderMicrophoneAudioManager and
utilized by the audio input device list in FAudioInputDevicePropertyCustomization.

bUseSystemDefaultAudioDevice: Boolean indicating if the system selects audio device should be used or to use the selected device from the details panel
DeviceInfoArray: Holds device information for each of the audio devices available on this system.
DeviceId: The unique id of the currently selected audio device
AudioInputBufferSize: The desired buffer size used for audio callbacks during record
